text: ninnalil ninn bharyamare vitteccu keant maranappetunnavar tannalute bharyamarkk oru keallattekk (vittil ninnâ€Œ) purattakkate jivitavibhavam nalkan vasviyyatt ceyyentatanâ€Œ. ennal avar (svayam) puratt peakunna paksam tannalute svantam karyattil maryadayanusaricc avar pravarttikkunnatil ninnalkk kurramilla. allahu pratapavanum suksmajnanamullavanumakunnu
